DICE Firmware Compiled on 8 Oct 2009
Main Page | Modules | Alphabetical List | Data Structures | Data Fields | Related Pages

Programming Utilities

Detailed Description

Various programming utilities are provided to simplify the development process.


Modules

 Command Line Interpreter (CLI)
 The Command Line Interpreter enables modules to install tools that can be invoked from the command prompt via a serial terminal.
 Packet Blocks
 Defines format and access functions for PB, the packet block that is used for passing packets between layers of the stack.
 Memory Pool Manager (MPM)
 This module provides dynamic memory access for packetblocks, packetblock payload data, and applications in a deterministic manner.
 Lock Transaction Handler
 A utility module for implementing lock transactions.
 Key-Value Maps
 This utility provides Key-Value maps.
 Data Stream Parsing
 Utility functions for parsing tightly bit-packed packets, such as AV/C.
 I2C Interface
 This module provides an interface between this device to other i2c slave devices.
Untitled Document
